channel.title: Now on UX Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Now on UX Engineer

item.title: What I'm doing now
item.description: What Iâ€™m doing now Life is a hectic affair; To help keep me sane and to give me some guidance, these are my current areas of focus: Photography Improving my photography, with my new(ish) toy Work Starting an “Inclusive Design Guild” with an awesome colleague Devoting time out to meetup regularly with my mentor(s) for a coffee Making a better effort to attend more local industry events & meetups such as NUX, UX&D as well as the great events being run within Auto Trader Reading Trying (and failing) to take part in GoodRead’s reading challenge.
